content:
That's really helpful! I think I'll choose a signature cocktail that's easy to make in large quantities and prep the ingredients in advance. I'll also set up a cocktail assembly line and have a "cocktail captain" to oversee the station.

Speaking of prep work, I was thinking of making some syrups and mixers from scratch to add a personal touch to my cocktails. Do you have any tips for making homemade syrups and mixers?
